message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product. I'm asking for $110 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, $110 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product but I can only go up to $85.  Let me know what you think!
Bob, I appreciate your offer but $85 is just a little too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $95. Let's make this happen!
Alice, $95 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  How about we split the difference and settle on $90?  I'm really keen on this product and I think this is a fair price for both of us.
